director.name: 卡塔琳娜·劳宁 Katarina Launing

introduction: Anja 是一名坚强的 14 岁女孩，她不在乎学校里的男孩们是否坚持说足球场不适合女孩。她就像其他年轻的女孩一样，喜欢和她的朋友们一起玩闹和踢足球。但是有一天，一个突如其来的噩耗在医院里等着她，她被确诊患有白血病。当一个患有重病的女孩第一次坠入爱河的时候会发生什么呢?她又是否会在比赛的这段时间里有所好转呢?Anja is a tough 14-year-old girl who doesn't care if the boys at school insist that the football pitch is no place for girls. She is like any other young girl who loves to hang out with her friends and play football. But one day, a nasty surprise awaits her at the hospital – she has leukaemia. So what's a girl to do when she's gravely ill and at the same time in love for the first time? And will she get well in time for the tournament?
